title.narrative: Kenya - Projet d’appui pour la formation technique, industrielle, professionnelle et en entreprenariat (TIVET)
Kenya - The Support for Technical, Industrial, Vocational and Entrepreneurship Training (TIVET) Project

description.narrative: The objective of the project is to improve access, quality and relevance of TIVET. The project has the following three components: (i) Construction of new technical training institutes and upgrading of existing TIVET institutions (ii) Human Capacity Building and Curriculum Review and Development and (iii) Creation of Centers of Excellence and Integration of ICT in TIVET.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
